main event: A round, silver or white UFO was sighted in Ventura, California on May 24, 1957, after a jet noise breaking the sound barrier. The object hardly moved, oscillated, and then faded from sight, witnessed for 22 minutes.
interesting points: The UFO was described as round, the size of a pinhead, and had a silver or white color.
The object was sighted after a jet noise breaking the sound barrier.
There was no radar paint of the object, but it was believed to be either a weather balloon or aircraft due to the location and the amount of small aircraft in the vicinity.
A similar sighting was reported in San Diego Bay, with a glistening, silver-white UFO observed for more than 45 minutes.
The UFO was observed at an altitude of 40,000 feet and seen traveling northwest.
